original_title: Steve Hackett - Live at Night of the Prog Festival VII Loreley Germany 2012
overview: Steve Hackett & Band - Loreley July 08, 2012  Steve Hackett plays at one of the biggest prog events in Germany.  Setlist: Intro Every Day Loch Lomond The Phoenix Flown Fire on the Moon The Carpet Crawlers Firth of Fifth Serpentine Song The Golden Age of Steam Shadow of the Hierophant Fly on a Windshield Sleepers A Place Called Freedom Los Endos Band Intro  Encore:  Spectral Mornings Watcher Of The Skies w/ Nad Sylvan On Guest Vocals
title: Steve Hackett - Live at Night of the Prog Festival VII Loreley Germany 2012
